title: ‘It’s Been a Hell of a Run’: Jayco-AlUla’s Lawson Craddock to Hang Up His Cleats in 2024
content:
A two-time US national time trial champion, he raced 10 grand tours and finished 3rd in the 2014 Amgen Tour of California.

Read the full article at ‘It’s Been a Hell of a Run’: Jayco-AlUla’s Lawson Craddock to Hang Up His Cleats in 2024 on Velo.
author: ahood
